name: Der Bauernhof
overview: Immerse yourself in the life on the farm with all its facets. You must feed the animals on the farm, cultivate beds and fields, and sell the products obtained profitably in the city. Newly purchased equipment, additionally employed workers, the purchase of additional animals and the cultivation of different plants help you to increase the capital and to operate profitable agriculture on a grand scale. If you have enough capital, you can expand your farm. The farm offers entertaining fun for young and old alike! - tutorial mode for the introduction into the fundamentals of the game - an exciting, comprehensive career mode - four varied and detailed scenarios: farm, city, hosthouse and farmland - complete freedom of movement - always change between the employees, all playable, possible - flora and fauna Depending on the soil or animal care - numerous animals and plants
